thread.section_title: Boro Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: awesome stay!!
thread.title_full: awesome stay!! - Review of Boro Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ktandjay L
title: awesome stay!!
text:
we got a studio king room it was awesome how ever now that we know rooms with tubes dont face the city i would go for the cheaper room on the city side of the building. but never the less it was very relaxing. they had parking for 25 a night. we left the car in parking the whole time and were able to walk 4 blocks to subway and were in manhatten in 15mins
Room Tip: rooms with tubes dont face manhatten See more room tips
